ualberta.g12.adventurecreator

Class StoryEditActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.StoryEditActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SView<Story>

    public class StoryEditActivity
extends Activity
implements SView<Story>
    View for editing a Story using a StoryController.
    This particular Activity should only be started via an intent from the main activity that has as an extra either the ID of the story to edit or NEW_STORY_ID
